analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x8e2b4f50c4d3ca9d3bf26be7b1b55795240f4bfa.sol:
	Contract FremenTradeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8e2b4f50c4d3ca9d3bf26be7b1b55795240f4bfa.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x8e2b4f50c4d3ca9d3bf26be7b1b55795240f4bfa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x8e2b4f50c4d3ca9d3bf26be7b1b55795240f4bfa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x8e2b4f50c4d3ca9d3bf26be7b1b55795240f4bfa.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
